tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE sales_metrics (sales_id INT, salesperson_name VARCHAR(255), sales_amount DECIMAL(10,2), sales_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_member_id INT,
    date DATE,
    calls_made INT,
    emails_sent INT,
    meetings_attended INT
);

CREATE TABLE sales_team (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sales_performance DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    sales_target DECIMAL NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE sales_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    target_value DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    actual_value DECIMAL NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE sales_history (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    sale_date DATE NOT NULL,
    sale_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE SalesTeamPerformance (
  team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name VARCHAR(50),
  sales_count INT,
  revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE SalesMetrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_name VARCHAR(50),
  target DECIMAL(8, 2),
  actual DECIMAL(8, 2),
  variance DECIMAL(8, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE SalesTeamMembers (
  member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_id INT,
  member_name VARCHAR(50),
  role VARCHAR(50),
  hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceReview (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  member_id INT,
  review_date DATE,
  feedback TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sales_team (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(255),
    team_leader VARCHAR(255),
    total_sales_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    average_sales_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE sales_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    target_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    actual_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    metric_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE sales_activity (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(255),
    activity_date DATE,
    activity_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sales_targets (
    target_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id INT,
    target_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    target_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE sales_performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id INT,
    performance_metric VARCHAR(255),
    performance_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    performance_date DATE
)
